quote: Of course there is large scale voter fraud happening on and before election day. Why do Republican leaders deny what is going on? So naive!
quotePlain: Of course there is large scale voter fraud happening on and before election day. Why do Republican leaders deny what is going on? So naive!
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: Actual instances of voter fraud — such as voter impersonation, ballot stuffing and bought votes  — are extremely rare, often unintentional and not on a scale large enough to affect a national election. Trump's alarming claim, once again, is without proof.
checks.quotePlain: Actual instances of voter fraud — such as voter impersonation, ballot stuffing and bought votes  — are extremely rare, often unintentional and not on a scale large enough to affect a national election. Trump’s alarming claim, once again, is without proof.

claims.title: voter fraud in 2016 election
claims.negative: there was no voter fraud in the 2016 election
claims.negativePlain: there was no voter fraud in the 2016 election
claims.truth: There is no credible evidence of illegal voting.
claims.truthPlain: There is no credible evidence of illegal voting.
